name: licenz
description: A decentralized content licensing platform for AI-generated content with blockchain protection and NFT capabilities

scripts.dev:backend:check: if (Test-Path "backend/main.go") { cd backend && go run main.go } else { echo "Backend not found, skipping..." }
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../blockchain && npm install
scripts.install:clean: npm run clean && npm install && npm run install:all
scripts.clean:all: Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules, package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue && cd frontend && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules, package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue && cd ../blockchain && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules, package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
scripts.size:analyze: npm run size:frontend && npm run size:blockchain
scripts.deps:check: npm outdated && cd frontend && npm outdated && cd ../blockchain && npm outdated
scripts.deps:update: npm update && cd frontend && npm update && cd ../blockchain && npm update
